rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with traditional Chettinad motifs and polished stone flooring.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Expansive living area featuring an open layout, high ceiling, and large windows for natural light, incorporating modern furniture with Chettinad elements.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Serves as a formal dining space integrated within the living area, designed to complement the aesthetic of the house.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A private guest room with built-in storage and a small attached bathroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space featuring wall-to-wall shelves, comfortable seating, and adequate lighting to support reading and study activities.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with intricate carvings reflecting Chettinad style.
Large casement windows offering ample natural light and ventilation.
Private balcony space providing an outdoor view and fresh air.
Provides access to the adjoining garden area with traditional Chettinad design details.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, following Vastu for personal growth.

rooms.name: Children's Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy room designed for children's comfort and privacy, with ample storage and a playful design theme.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space suitable for extended family or guests, designed to maintain harmonious energy as per Vastu principles.

openings.location: Between Ground Floor and First Floor
openings.description: Spiral staircase designed for aesthetic appeal while adhering to safety regulations.
